From this, I can see that Pennsylvania17 and Pennsylvania7 both had their incumbents first elected in the 1980s. That's two districts, which means the claim is false because it states that only Pennsylvania17 does so. 

Wait, but let me double-check to make sure I didn't miss any other districts. Scanning through each row again, no, only those two have first elections in the 80s. So the claim is incorrect.
